title: Start with the File tab
text: To print a worksheet, you need to start by clicking on the 'File' tab in the menu.

title: Navigate to the Print option
text: After clicking on the 'File' tab, look for the 'Print' option in the menu.

title: Check the scaling options
text: Before printing, ensure that the scaling is set to 'No Scaling' to avoid any unwanted adjustments to your worksheet.

hintAnswer: File, Print tab, No Scaling, Print
title: Sequence of actions
text: What is the correct sequence of buttons to print a worksheet?
choices: File, Print tab, No Scaling, Print
File, Print, No Scaling, Print tab
